abilities.name: Litany of Hate
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Recitation of Faith
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Relic Shield
abilities.rule: The bearer has a Wounds characteristic of 6.

wargear_abilities.name: Relic Shield
wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer has a Wounds characteristic of 6.

wargear_options: ■ This model’s storm bolter can be replaced with 1 relic shield.
